name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-graph-chat-lifecycle-csharp
title: Chat LifeCycle Application
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to manage the chat lifecycle in Microsoft Teams, including creating chats, adding members, and deleting members using Microsoft Graph APIs with C#.
longDescription: This sample application showcases the complete lifecycle management of chats in Microsoft Teams, allowing users to create, add members, and delete members while utilizing Microsoft Graph APIs. Built with C#, it features tab integration, adaptive cards, and a welcome card for a seamless user experience.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing chat lifecycle application
